admit.title: UPSSSC PET Admit Card 2025 – Out
admit.excerpt: UPSSSC ने Preliminary Examination Test (PET) Admit Card 2025 जारी कर दिया है. Exam dates: 06-07 Sep 2025.
admit.content:
How to download: Visit official website upsssc.gov.in → Examination → Preliminary Eligibility Test admit card. Login with Registration No. & DOB.

Carry printed admit card and ID proof to exam center.

admit.title: SSC CGL Tier-I Exam City Details 2025
admit.excerpt: SSC released Exam City Details for CGL Tier-I 2025. Exam 12–26 Sep 2025.
admit.content: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the Exam City Details for the SSC CGL Tier-I Exam 2025. Candidates can check their Exam City Details using Registration Number, Enrollment Number, or Date of Birth by logging into the official SSC portal. Download the City Intimation Slip and take a printout for reference. For age limits, eligibility, and vacancy details, check the official SSC notification.

admit.title: RRB NTPC 10+2 Inter Level Admit Card / Exam City Details 2025
admit.excerpt: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) released Admit Card for NTPC 10+2 Inter Level Posts. Exam from 07 August – 08 September 2025.
admit.content: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released Admit Card for NTPC 10+2 Inter Level Posts. Candidates can check their Exam Date and Admit Card details using Enrollment Number / Registration Number / Date of Birth by logging into the official RRB portal. Download the admit card and take a printout for exam day reference. For eligibility, age limits, and vacancy details, check the official notification.

jobs.title: BPSC School Teacher TRE 4.0 Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online
jobs.excerpt: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) ने TRE 4.0 School Teacher भर्ती 2025 की अधिसूचना जारी कर दी है। इसमें कुल 27,910 पद हैं। आवेदन सितंबर 2025 से शुरू होंगे। परीक्षा 16-19 दिसंबर 2025 तक आयोजित होगी।

fees.Payment Mode: Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking / IMPS / Wallet

eligibility.Class 1 to 5: Bachelor Degree with 50% + B.Ed OR 10+2 with 2 Year D.El.Ed OR 4 Year BLEd OR CTET/BTET Paper I Qualified
eligibility.Class 6 to 8: Graduate with D.El.Ed OR Graduate/Post Graduate with 50% + B.Ed OR BA B.Ed / B.Sc B.Ed OR PG with 55% + 3 Year B.Ed-M.Ed
eligibility.Class 9 to 10 (TGT): Graduate/Post Graduate in Subject with 50% + B.Ed OR BA B.Ed / B.Sc B.Ed OR STET Paper I Qualified
eligibility.Class 9 to 10 (TGT-Special): Graduate/Post Graduate in Subject with 50% + B.Ed OR BA B.Ed / B.Sc B.Ed OR STET Paper I Qualified
eligibility.Class 11 to 12 (PGT): Post Graduate in Subject with 50% + B.Ed OR PG with 55% + 3 Year B.Ed-M.Ed OR STET Paper II Qualified

jobs.content:
How to Apply: इच्छुक उम्मीदवार BPSC की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर जाकर सितंबर 2025 से ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। आवेदन करने से पहले आधिकारिक अधिसूचना जरूर पढ़ें।

आवेदन के लिए पासपोर्ट साइज फोटो, हस्ताक्षर, शैक्षिक प्रमाण पत्र, जाति प्रमाण पत्र, आधार कार्ड और अन्य आवश्यक दस्तावेज अपलोड करने होंगे।

Selection Process: लिखित परीक्षा और दस्तावेज़ सत्यापन (DV)।
